description:
A stylish minimalistic binary Watchface that displays the current time and date in BCD (binary coded decimal) or true binary format. The look is inspired by the BCD clock I have in my living room. Works on square and round Pebbles with color and monochrome displays.

The configuration page shows a live preview of the current settings.

How to read BCD format:
* Each column represents one digit
* Two columns each for hours, minutes and seconds
* The rows have the values 1, 2, 4, 8 (from bottom to top)
* Add the values of all "on" bits in a column to get the digit

Configurable options:
* All colors
* Different styles for the bits, with or without borders
* Display of seconds, also only in certain intervals
* Display of date
* Display in true binary format instead of BCD
* Display help after tapping the watch, with or without decoration
* Bluetooth connection loss/reconnection alert (icon or color switch)
* Low battery level alert
* Hourly vibration
* Reaction to timeline quick view window

How to read true binary format:
* The first row represents the hours, the second are minutes and the last row shows the seconds
* The columns have the values 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32 (from right to left)
* Add the values of all "on" bits in a row to get the number

Please contact me at pebble@timm.tc for bug reports, questions or feature requests.

Please remember to "heart" the Watchface if you like it. Thanks!
